The Ranger chooses a target area, which for the next 2 seconds is attacked with a hail of arrows dealing physical damage once in a second. All enemies in this area are slowed.

Raises the shield and for a short duration reflects all the incoming damage back to an enemy. The Defender is still able to move while reflecting the damage. Preserving the type of reflected damage, the Defender becomes immune to crowd control and damage. They also create an area behind their backs in which allies take reduced incoming damage.

The Ranger's basic attacks leave arrows in enemies. The Ranger gains bonus attack speed for each arrow. The effect stacks 10 times. The special ability can be activated, which triggers an explosion of all arrows stuck in enemies dealing physical damage.

The Defender jumps to a target location dealing physical damage upon landing and taunt all enemies to attack them for 2 seconds.
The Defender throws their shield in a target. If the shield hits a target, it bounces to the enemies several times, dealing physical damage. The first target hit by the shield is stunned.

The Defender empowers their next basic attack. An empowered basic attack during 7 seconds permits them to hit a target with a powerful strike dealing physical damage. After this empowered strike, the Defender buffs themself, which reduces incoming damage by 3%. This effect lasts 10 seconds, stacks up to 5 times, and refreshes its effect period with each stack.

Each durability level increases the damage the turret deals by 15%. The turret is destroyed when its durability level reaches 0.
Maximum turrets deployed: 2.

The Engineer places an automatic turret that deals [md]{{Data.0.AC3}}[/md][hide] ([wh]{{Data.0.AC1}}[/wh]+[sp]{{Data.0.AC2}}[/sp][spicon])[/hide] magic damage to all enemies in front of it.
If a second turret is nearby, the two will connect, creating an electric beam that reduces enemies' movement speed by [ms]40%[/ms] and increases allies' movement speed by [ms]30%[/ms].
When placed, turrets have a durability level of 2 (out of a maximum of 4). A turret's durability level decreases over time and when it is damaged by enemies' basic attacks. Each durability level increases the damage the turret deals by [wh]15%[/wh]. The turret is destroyed when its durability level reaches [wh]0[/wh].
Maximum turrets deployed: [wh]{{Data.0.St}}[/wh].

If cast on an enemy: The Engineer delivers a powerful blow to a target, dealing physical damage and stunning the target for 2 seconds.
If cast on a turret: The Engineer hits the turret, causing it to generate an electric pulse. The pulse deals magic damage and slows enemies within a short range from the turret and increases the turret's attack speed for 5 seconds.
Generates 2 combo points.

If cast on an enemy: The Engineer delivers a powerful blow to a target, dealing [pd]{{Data.0.ADF}}[/pd][hide] ([wh]{{Data.0.AC1}}[/wh]+[ap]{{Data.0.AC2}}[/ap][api])[/hide] physical damage and stunning the target for [wh]2[/wh] seconds.
If cast on a turret: The Engineer hits the turret, causing it to generate an electric pulse. The pulse deals [md]{{Data.0.wq1v1}}[/md][hide] ([wh]{{Data.0.AC3}}[/wh]+[sp]{{Data.0.AC4}}[/sp][spicon])[/hide] magic damage and slows enemies within a short range from the turret by [ms]{{@7iJGdyuQi4f:Data.0.MsK-}}[/ms] and increases the turret's attack speed on [wh]30%[/wh] for [wh]5[/wh] seconds.
Generates [wh]2[/wh] combo points.

The Berserker unleashes their rage for 10 seconds, increasing their attack speed by 20% and damage dealt by 30%.
While the ability is active, the Berserker gains twice as much rage.

The Berserker leaps into a target area, stunning all enemies in the area for 1 second and dealing physical damage.
The leap generates 25 rage.

The Berserker's attack speed is increased by 100% for the next 4 basic attacks. The fourth basic attack deals additional physical damage.
The ability causes an enemy to bleed if the Berserker's rage is greater than or equal to 50.

The Berserker throws an axe at a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies it passes through, and slowing them. The Berserker can pick up the axe to reduce the ability's cooldown by 3 seconds.
The damage the ability deals is increased by 20% if the Berserker's rage is greater than or equal to 50.
On the point of a spear

Ironclad pushes enemies away from itself in a small sector and deals physical damage. Enemies fly off at medium range and receive a mark. Allies who are in the area of ​​effect of the ability receive a buff on armor.

Ironclad swings his spear and throws it. The longer the swing, the further it flies. The spear deals physical damage and slows down. If it hits a target with a mark, then it also imposes a provocation.

Ironclad throws the target closest to it at the specified point, which deals physical damage to all enemies in the landing zone, including the original target, but does not damage allies. All enemies in the zone are stunned. Allies in this zone receive a buff on attack speed and casting speed, while opponents get a buff on running speed, attack speed, and casting speed.

When used, ironclad removes all controls from itself, takes 70% less damage, as well as a bonus to movement speed and tenacity. For each killed enemy, in the murder of which he took part, restores part of his health.
Броненосец кидает в указанную область сингулярную гранату, которая через некоторое время взрывается, наносит магический урон и стягивает противников в центр взрыва.
Броненосец впадает в ярость и начинает поливать огнем всех противников перед собой. Во время атаки он может медленно передвигаться, но не может изменить направление атак, а также остановить их.
Совершает рывок в указанном направлении. Все враги, оказавшиеся на пути Броненосца, получают физический урон.
Бросает на землю устройство, которое создает защитный купол в указанной точке. Все автоатаки, совершенные извне по Броненосцу и союзникам, не достигнут целей под куполом.

Призывает на помощь Призрачного волка, который сражается на стороне Броненосца. Если цели, которые атакует волк, находятся под действием Проклятия волка, то вместо обычной автоатаки, волк нанесет урон по области.
Броненосец бьет кастетами перед собой, чем наносит физический урон по области. Если цель находится под действием Проклятия волка, то она замедляется.
The Furious vanguard crushes an enemy's armor with its strikes, dealing additional damage and increasing its attack speed.
Броненосец окружает себя универсальным щитом. Через 2 сек щит можно взорвать, или же, через время он взорвется сам и нанесет магический урон врагам.
The paladin uses his shield to perform his next basic attack, dealing additional physical damage and stunning the target.
The paladin deals physical damage to the sector. In this zone, a shield is applied to allies.
Fires a beam of light forward, slowing enemies and removing slows from allies. Combo - rays radiate around the paladin, dealing magic damage. Allies in the area receive a buff on Attack Power.
The paladin places a mark on an enemy or ally. The label hangs for 5 seconds. When the mark ends, deals pure damage equal to 10% of all damage taken during the mark's duration.
The paladin causes a massive explosion around him. The longer it charges, the more magic damage it deals.
Each time it deals damage, the paladin causes the enemy to bleed and take physical damage for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times. Then the enemy can be blown up.
The paladin's next basic attack damages an enemy's vital artery. While the target is bleeding, its movement speed is reduced.
The paladin hits with two hands and stuns the enemy.

The paladin leaps onto an enemy champion and delivers a killing blow, dealing pure damage. This damage increases with each stack of Bleed on the target. If the target dies from the blow, then within a short time the skill can be used again.

The paladin raises a shield to increase his armor and magic resistance, as well as gain resistance to damage. If during the end of this effect there are opponents next to him, they will receive magic damage, and the duration of the skill will be increased.
The paladin spins the morning star and strikes at medium range. After that, he pulls the enemy towards him.
The paladin summons a beam of solar energy, damaging enemies in the area of the spell. Enemies in the center of the area will be stunned, and those at the edges will be slowed down.

The Pyromancer throws a fireball that deals magic damage to an enemy.
Additional effect: A fireball deals magic damage to nearby enemies. Range increased by 3 meters.

The Pyromancer throws a fireball that deals [md]{{Data.0.ADF}}[/md][hide] ([wh]{{Data.0.AC1}}[/wh]+[sp]{{Data.0.AC2}}[/sp][spicon])[/hide] magic damage to an enemy.
Additional effect: A fireball deals [md]{{Data.0.ADC1}}[/md][hide] ([wh]{{Data.0.AC3}}[/wh]+[sp]{{Data.0.AC4}}[/sp][spicon])[/hide] magic damage to nearby enemies. Range increased by 3 meters.

The Pyromancer creates a demonic portal for 3 seconds. The portal slows enemies and starts to pull them in. When the effect ends, the portal deals magic damage, instantly pulls the enemies to its center and roots them for 1.5 seconds.
Additional effect: Affected enemies are set on fire and take magic damage for 3 seconds.

The Pyromancer creates a demonic portal for [wh]3[/wh] seconds. The portal slows enemies and starts to pull them in. When the effect ends, the portal deals [md]{{Data.0.ADF}}[/md][hide] ([wh]{{Data.0.AC1}}[/wh]+[sp]{{Data.0.AC2}}[/sp][spicon])[/hide] magic damage, instantly pulls the enemies to its center and roots them for [wh]{{@7iJGdtbWTsx:Data.0.T}}[/wh][hide] ([wh]{{@7iJGdtbWTsx:Data.0.AC1}}[/wh]+[hp]{{@7iJGdtbWTsx:Data.0.AC2}}[/hp][hpi][/hide] seconds.
Additional effect: Affected enemies are set on fire and take [md]{{Data.0.ADC1}}[/md][hide] ([wh]{{Data.0.AC3}}[/wh]+[sp]{{Data.0.AC4}}[/sp][spicon])[/hide] magic damage for [wh]3[/wh] seconds.

The Pyromancer dashes, leaving a trail of fire for 2 seconds that deals magic damage over time. Reactivating this ability returns the Pyromancer to their starting location.
Additional effect: Upon dashing, the Pyromancer explodes, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

The Pyromancer dashes, leaving a trail of fire for [wh]{{Data.0.AC4}}[/wh][hide] ([wh]2[/wh]+[hp]{{Data.0.AC3}}[/hp][hpi])[/hide] seconds that deals [md]{{Data.0.wq1v1}}[/md][hide] ([wh]{{Data.0.ADC1}}[/wh]+[sp]{{Data.0.ADC2}}[/sp][spicon])[/hide] magic damage over time. Reactivating this ability returns the Pyromancer to their starting location.
Additional effect: Upon dashing, the Pyromancer explodes, dealing [md]{{Data.0.ADF}}[/md][hide] ([wh]{{Data.0.AC1}}[/wh]+[sp]{{Data.0.AC2}}[/sp][spicon])[/hide] magic damage to nearby enemies.

The Pyromancer calls down a meteor that lands at a target area, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies within the area for 2 seconds.
Additional effect: The meteor's damage radius increases by 100%.

The Pyromancer calls down a meteor that lands at a target area, dealing [md]{{Data.0.ADF}}[/md][hide] ([wh]{{Data.0.AC1}}[/wh]+[sp]{{Data.0.AC2}}[/sp][spicon])[/hide] and stunning enemies within the area for [wh]{{@O8FCeScGYYA:Data.0.T}}[/wh][hide] ([wh]{{@O8FCeScGYYA:Data.0.AC1}}[/wh]+[hp]{{@O8FCeScGYYA:Data.0.AC2}}[/hp][hpi])[/hide] seconds.
Additional effect: The meteor's damage radius increases by [wh]100%[/wh].
The Soul Eater leaps in a direction. The first enemy they collide with is rooted for 1 second, and the Soul Eater strikes them with 3 quick stabs dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

The Soul Eater creates a soul shadow. Upon recast, the Soul Eater teleports to their soul shadow.
The soul shadow detonates on contact with the Soul Eater to deal magic damage in an area.

The Soul Eater lunges stabbing with their crescent blades and deals physical damage to all enemies in a line.
If the ability hits at least one enemy, it can be re-cast: the Soul Eater cleaves forward, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a cone.

The Soul Eater chooses a target location and, after a short delay, creates a cage there. Enemies trapped in the cage take magic damage and passing through an edge of the cage are stunned for 2 seconds.
If the ability hits at least one enemy, it can be re-cast: the Soul Eater throws their blades in a target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies they hit in their path.

The Warlock launches a magic chain in a direction. This creates a tether between themself and an enemy or ally; the tether lasts 10 seconds. If the distance between the Warlock and a target exceeds 8 meters, the tether is broken. The Warlock can basic attack and use other abilities.
Tether with an enemy deals magic damage over time. Damage increases over time.
When tethered to an ally, the Warlock sacrifices a portion of their health and additionally heals the ally. Healing increases over time.

The Warlock applies a debuff that drains an enemy's health: it periodically deals magic damage and gives the Warlock equal amount of health, and additional healing. It lasts 7 seconds. The ability can affect two enemies.

The Warlock debuffs an enemy. After a 1-second delay, their next basic attack against the debuffed enemy strikes the enemy with fear that lasts 2 seconds.
When the fear effect is activated, the ability can be re-cast on an ally binding their and the enemy's souls together.
When the fear effect expires, debuffs are triggered. They deal magic damage over 10 seconds and reduce movement speed by 30% for 3 seconds. The soulbound ally is healed by the amount of damage dealt, and gets additional healing.

The Warlock's damage-over-time effects explode on all affected enemies, dealing magic damage per effect. For every active Warlock's healing effect, allies restore their health. After the explosion, the effects remain active on their targets.

The Bomber begins cycling through enhancements (after activation, the effect changes every 5 seconds). Reactivating the ability activates the current enhancement.
Enhancement 1: Outgoing healing is increased by 20%. Enhancement 2: The Bomber delivers the next 3 auto-attacks at maximum attack speed. Enhancement 3: Inflicted magical damage is increased by 20%.

The Bomber begins cycling through enhancements (after activation, the effect changes every <w>5</w> seconds). Reactivating the ability activates the current enhancement.
<w>Enhancement 1:</w> Outgoing <heal>healing</heal> or <shield>shielding</shield> is increased by <heal>{{@7h7vr0h1j29:Data.0.ACP1}}</heal>. <w>Enhancement 2:</w> The Bomber delivers the next 3 auto-attacks at maximum <as>attack speed</as> <as>{{@7h7vr5nEAYV:Data.0.ACP1}}</as>. <w>Enhancement 3:</w> Damage of the next ability is increased by <md>{{@7h7vqvbiuAe:Data.0.ACP2}}</md>. Weapon Specialization Bonus -1 mana cost.

Each Grenadier's ability leaves explosive charges on an enemy, which lasts 5 seconds and stacks up to 6 times. When the Grenadier uses the special ability, the charges detonate, triggering an explosion and dealing magic damage.

Attacks and abilities directed at an enemy's back receive a bonus damage of 10% adaptive. The Bomber can activate a special ability and throw a dagger in the chosen direction, followed by a second dagger within 2 seconds. Upon hitting the target, the dagger impales and deals 100% damage. Cooldown is 30 seconds. After using the special ability, the Bomber remains unarmed for 5 seconds.

Attacks and abilities directed at an enemy's back receive a bonus damage of <w>{{Data.0.ACP2}}</w> = [<w>10%</w> + <w>2%</w> AttackPower or SpellPower]. The Bomber can activate a special ability and throw a dagger in the chosen direction, followed by a second dagger within 2 seconds. Upon hitting the target, the dagger impales and deals <pd>{{Data.0.ADF2}}</pd> = [<ap>{{Data.0.ACP1}}</ap> AttackPower] <pd>physical damage</pd>. Cooldown is <w>30</w> seconds. After using the <ulti>special ability</ulti>, the Bomber remains unarmed for <w>5</w> seconds. Weapon Specialization Bonus: +0.5% damage from behind.

For each basic attack or use of ability, which hits an enemy, the Destroyer gains 1% bonus Attack Speed. The buff stacks up to 10 charges. The charge lasts 10 seconds and refreshes. Activation of the special ability is available on 10 charges only, and the Destroyer starts to whirl, dealing physical damage with their weapon every 0.75 seconds to all nearest enemies during 5 seconds. After that, all empowered charges fall off.

For each auto-attack or ability use that hit the enemy, the Destroyer receives a <w>1%</w><as> Attack Speed</as>. The buff stacks up to <w>10</w> times. Each charge last for <w>5</w> seconds and is refreshed on a successful auto attack.
Upon activating the special ability (possible only at <w>10</w> charges), the Destroyer starts spinning around himself, dealing <pd>{{Data.0.ADF}}</pd> = [ <ap>{{Data.0.ACP1}}</ap> AttackPower] <pd>physical damage</pd> to all nearby enemies every <w>0.75</w> seconds for <w>{{Data.0.T}}</w> seconds. After the ability ends, all charges are reset. Weapon Specialization Bonus +0.75 seconds to effect duration.
The Defender gains bonus armor and magic resistance for each enemy in the 3 meters range around the Defender.

Every spell the Pyromancer casts gives them Heat, which gradually fills the Heat Meter.
Reaching the yellow zone (at 50%) of the Heat Meter grants all Pyromancer's abilities bonus effect.
Reaching the red zone (at 100%) of the Heat Meter grants all Pyromancer's abilities 30% more damage. However, using any ability in the red zone additionally causes an explosion that deals magic damage to the Pyromancer.

Every spell the Pyromancer casts gives them Heat, which gradually fills the Heat Meter.
Reaching the yellow zone (at 50%) of the Heat Meter grants all Pyromancer's abilities bonus effect.
Reaching the red zone (at 100%) of the Heat Meter grants all Pyromancer's abilities 30% more damage. However, using any ability in the red zone additionally causes an explosion that deals [md]{{Data.0.ADF}}[/md][hide] ([wh]20%[/wh] from [hp]Max Health[/hp][hpi])[/hide] magic damage to the Pyromancer.
Also, if the Pyromancer dies while in the red zone, an explosion occurs that deals [md]{{Data.0.ADF}}[/md][hide] ([wh]20%[/wh] from [hp]Max Health[/hp][hpi])[/hide] magic damage to everyone around.

The Soul Eater's basic attacks have a chance to drop soul shards. Picking up a soul shard grants the Soul Eater or their allies reduced by 1 second cooldown on all their abilities. The picked up shards return to their owners, dealing magic damage based on the spell power of those who picked them up. Stepping on soul shards, enemies destroy them.

For every active damage-over-time debuff on an enemy, the Warlock's Spell Power increases by 5%.
For every active buff on an ally, the Warlock gains 5% healing efficiency.
On activating the special ability, the Warlock sacrifices 20% of their current health to shield them for 300% of the sacrificed health. The Warlock's movement speed increases by 30%. Shield and bonus movement speed lasts 5 seconds.

Activating the special ability allows the Sniper to place a tracking totem that reveals a small area within the fog of war.
Passive: The Sniper can't basic attack. To fire, a cartridge must be chambered. After 5 shots, the Sniper must reload, which takes 1.5 seconds.
If the Sniper stands still for 3 seconds, they become invisible. When the Sniper moves or casts an ability, the invisibility effect ends.
Using the Q or E ability grants bonus movement speed.

A turret's durability level increases by 1 when the Engineer basic attacks it.
A turret is surrounded by an aura that grants the Engineer bonus armor and resistance.
Basic attack generates a combo point.

A turret's durability level increases by 1 when the Engineer basic attacks it.
A turret is surrounded by an aura that grants the Engineer [arm]{{@7iJGdz76vPv:Data.0.Arm+}}[/arm] bonus armor and resistance.
Basic attack generates a combo point.

The Berserker's basic attack generates 7 rage (critical damage generates 14 rage).
The Berserker has a 20% chance to land an additional hit on a target after a basic attack.
The Berserker gains 0% - 100% bonus attack power (based on their missing health).

Ironclad gets armor and magic resistance buffs when he hits an enemy with ability. For each armor and magic resistance Ironclad gains attack power bonus. Deals additional magic damage to controlled units.
Amplifies all damage based on the distance to a target. Does more damage the closer to a target he is.
Every next auto attack gives combo points. It can be used at any time to deal damage to the area around Ironclad. The bigger the number of combo points, the higher the damage.

After using an ability Paladin gets a buff for the next auto attack. Enhanced auto attack deals bonus magic damage and casts a spell of gradual healing for Paladin. When having three charges Paladin gets a buff on Movement Speed.
If the ability hits the target, auto attack gets charged with additional magic damage. Successful hits reduce cooldown of abilities, speed up Paladin and slow an enemy.
When using ability Paladin gets Shield which protects from physical damage and which also increases Resistance. The effect does not stack, but it restores.

The Legionary removes all crowd control effects on themself. For 5 seconds, they take reduced damage, gain bonus movement speed and bonus tenacity.
The Legionary restores a portion of their health on an enemy kill or assist.

After using an ability, next basic attack the Hand of the Light casts is empowered. An empowered basic attack deals bonus magic damage and casts periodic healing on the Hand of the Light. Empowerment stacks up to 3 times. When the periodic healing effect stacks at 3 charges, the Hand of the Light gains bonus movement speed for 5 seconds, and when expired, the charges are reset.

After using an ability, next basic attack the Hand of the Light casts is empowered. An empowered basic attack deals [md]{{@O8FCe8dBJGx:Data.0.ADF}}[/md][hide] ([wh]{{@O8FCe8dBJGx:Data.0.AC1}}[/wh]+[uty]{{@O8FCe8dBJGx:Data.0.AC2}}[/uty]+[sp]{{@O8FCe8dBJGx:Data.0.AC3}}[/sp][spicon])[/hide] bonus magic damage and casts [heal]{{@O8FCe8dBJGx:Data.0.ADF}}[/heal][hide] [wh]({{@O8FCe8dBJGx:Data.0.AC1}}[/wh]+[uty]{{@O8FCe8dBJGx:Data.0.AC3}}[/uty]+[mp]{{@O8FCe8dBJGx:Data.0.AC2}}[/mp][mpi])[/hide] periodic healing on the Hand of the Light in 5 sec. Empowerment stacks up to 3 times. When the periodic healing effect stacks at 3 charges, the Hand of the Light gains [ms]{{@O8FCeNeuuaV:Data.0.MsK+}}[/ms] bonus movement speed for 5 seconds, and when expired, the charges are reset.

The Cleric shields themself or an ally. The shield absorbs all incoming damage. If the shield has more than 1 strength point upon its expiration, it triggers a magic explosion in the range of 2.5 meters around the hero. All enemies in the range of the explosion are stunned.

For 3 seconds, the Cleric surrounds themself with an aura, which heals allies, increases the Cleric's movement speed, and reduces the incoming damage. While aura is active, the Cleric can basic attack, but is not able to use abilities.

When attacking, the Cleric gets and stacks charges, which empower their abilities by 2%. Charges stack up to 5 times and are automatically reset when any of the abilities was used.
Stacked charges will be reset if the special ability is activated, and basic attacks will deal additional magic damage for 10 seconds.

The Crusader flings a chain in a target direction, which deals physical damage the first enemy it hits and drags an enemy back to the Crusader. The ability taunts enemies to attack the Crusader for 2 seconds.

The Crusader starts to charge the ability. They can't use any other abilities, launch basic attacks, and move. The ability charges for 2 seconds and triggers an explosion, which deals magic damage.
Recast: an explosion will occur instantly, and damage dealt will depend on the amount of time the ability was charging.

The Crusader raises their shield and blocks the first attack or ability. If the damage has been blocked, the Crusader can recast the ability. The Crusader deals physical damage in a small area in front of them and slows all affected enemies.

The Crusader creates a field on the ground. All enemies trapped in this field can't use teleporting and dashing abilities. All allies within the field take reduced damage. When enemies cross the border of the field, they will be disarmed and will take magic damage.
When the Crusader or their allies cross the border of the field, they gain bonus movement speed.
Each basic attack of the Crusader marks an enemy. The mark stacks up to 10 times. Upon reaching the maximum stacks, the mark stuns the enemy for 2 seconds.

The shaman quickly leaps towards the target, preparing to deliver a series of destabilizing strikes. The next 4 auto-attacks reduce the target's armor and magical resistance by 5 units per auto-attack for 6 seconds. With 5 charges of elemental power, the target is immobilized for 2 seconds. Consumes all charges of the special ability.

▪ Earth element - Wolf Totem. Enhances the shaman's attacks by Attack Power within an 8-meter radius. Allies receive 50% of the enhancements.
The totem consumes all charges of the special ability.

The shaman summons a wolf. There is a strong spiritual connection between the wolf and the shaman. The attack power, attack speed, health, armor, and magical resistance of the wolf are 50% of the shaman's stats. If the wolf dies, the shaman loses 20% of his health.
- Direction to the enemy: The wolf attacks the designated target, and every 5th attack deals additional magical damage.
- Direction to the shaman: The wolf returns to the shaman.
- Direction to the wolf: The shaman casts a channeling spell and transfers a portion of his health to the wolf during 5 seconds. Every second shaman loses 1% health, and in return, the wolf gains 3% health.
- Direction to the position: The wolf runs to the specified place and stays there. If the shaman moves beyond a 20-meter radius, the wolf returns to the shaman.

The shaman gathers electricity from the atmosphere and releases lightning at the target, dealing magical damage Spell Power. With 5 charges of elemental power, the cast is instant. Consumes all charges of the special ability.

The shaman gathers electricity from the atmosphere and releases lightning at the target, dealing <md>{{Data.0.ADF2}}</md> = [<w>{{Data.0.ADC1}}</w> + ({{Data.0.ACP1}})SpellPower] <md>magical damage</md>. With <w>5</w> charges of elemental power, the cast is <w>instant</w>. Consumes all charges of the special ability. Weapon Specialization Bonus +0.5 ability range.

The Commando fires a piercing shell in a target direction, hitting all enemies in its path. Enemies take physical damage and armor reduction debuff for 5 seconds. The effect stacks up to 3 times.
